scripts.watch: npm test && fswatch -0or src/Main.elm | xargs -0  -n1 -I{} npm test
scripts.tcr: npm run tcr-run; fswatch -0or src/GildedRose.elm | xargs -0  -n1 -I{} npm run tcr-run
scripts.tcr-run: clear && npm test && npm run tcr-commit || npm run tcr-revert
scripts.tcr-revert: osascript update-snapshot-or-revert.scpt && git checkout .; npm run tcr-run
